content: लब्ध {%<ab>p. p.</ab>%} [लभ्-कर्मणि क्त] {@--1@} Got, obtained, acquired. {@--2@} Taken, received. {@--3@} Perceived, apprehended. {@--4@} Obtained (as by division &c.); see लभ्. --ब्धा A woman whose husband or lover is faithless (perhaps for विप्रलब्धा). --ब्धं That which is secured or got; लब्धं रक्षेदवक्षयात् <ls>H. 2. 8</ls>; <ls>R. 19. 3.</ls>
